content.raw: The partition is something that is set at the Node level and only nodes with the same partition names can talk each other. It's possible to set it programatically when you create the node or via an environment variable. Other than that, is handled privately. We can save somewhere (probably one time, not at a topic level) the partition that we're using when launching the logger and is being used for receiving the messages (for debugging purposes maybe). However, for playingback the log, we might use a different partition, or maybe just the default one instead of the one used to capture the log. This will be more flexible.
